trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch to a designer view (such as **Design** view in [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control markup is parsed.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar para um modo de exibição designer (como **Design** exibir em [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]), o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>marcação de controle é analisada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A design-time version of the control is then created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When you switch to source view, the design-time control is persisted as the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar para exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é mantido como a marcação para a página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the ListViewDesigner class provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a list of items that are used to create a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades da classe ListViewDesigner fornecem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade retorna uma lista de itens que são usados para criar um painel de marcas inteligentes.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A> property returns the number of records that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control displays on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A>propriedade retorna o número de registros que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controle exibe na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, which indicates that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>propriedade sempre retorna `true`, que indica que o designer cria uma cópia temporária do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The methods of the ListViewDesigner class provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> methods return the HTML markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos da classe ListViewDesigner fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>métodos retornam a marcação HTML que é usada para renderizar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controle em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> methods provide support for editable regions at design time.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>métodos oferecem suporte para regiões editáveis em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.Initialize%2A>método prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internamente cria uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner>classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controle ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of items that are is used to create a smart tag panel for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de itens que são é usada para criar um painel de marcas inteligentes para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> object that is associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> objeto que está associado este designer.

trans-unit.source: Generates the HTML markup that is used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Gera a marcação HTML que é usada para renderizar associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If the two required templates for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) are not defined, the GetDesignTimeHtml method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to generate the HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: Se os dois necessário modelos para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controle (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) não estão definidas, as chamadas de método GetDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>método para gerar a marcação HTML.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListViewDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup that is used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A marcação HTML que é usada para renderizar associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Generates the HTML markup that is used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control at design time, and populates the specified collection with the currently selected designer region.
trans-unit.target: Gera a marcação HTML que é usada para renderizar associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controlar em tempo de design e preenche a coleção especificada com a região de designer atualmente selecionada.

trans-unit.source: A collection of designer regions for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de regiões de designer para associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup that is used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A marcação HTML que é usada para renderizar associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Returns the content for the specified editable region of the design-time view of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o conteúdo para a área editável especificado da exibição de tempo de design de associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The GetEditableDesignerRegionContent method overrides the default implementation to support region-based editing on the design surface and to return the content for a specified region.
trans-unit.target: O método GetEditableDesignerRegionContent substitui a implementação padrão para oferecer suporte a edição baseada em região na superfície de design e para retornar o conteúdo para uma região especificada.

trans-unit.source: The region to get the content for.
trans-unit.target: A região para obter o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup for the region.
trans-unit.target: A marcação HTML para a região.

trans-unit.source: Generates the HTML markup that represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control at design time that has no visual representation at run time.
trans-unit.target: Gera a marcação HTML que representa um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controle em tempo de design que não tem representação visual em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml method is used by the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control at design time if the two required templates for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) are not defined.
trans-unit.target: O método GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml é usado pelo designer para renderizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controlar em tempo de design se os dois necessário modelos para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controle (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) não estão definidas.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%29> method to create a placeholder that displays the type and the ID of the control, and additional instructions for the user.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%29>método para criar um espaço reservado que exibe o tipo e a ID do controle e instruções adicionais para o usuário.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup that represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A marcação HTML que representa um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the control designer and loads the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o designer de controle e carrega o controle especificado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: O host de designer chama o método Initialize quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are required for the designer.
trans-unit.target: O método Initialize e seus métodos base configurem propriedades e conecte-se para eventos que são necessários para o designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controle associado este designer, ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The control that is being designed.
trans-unit.target: O controle que está sendo criado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle associado é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged method overrides its base implementation to ignore change notifications while persisting a template's content in the page markup.
trans-unit.target: O OnComponentChanged método substitui sua implementação base para ignorar as notificações de alteração ao mesmo tempo, manter o conteúdo do modelo na marcação da página.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Prevents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control from updating when the data source schema is refreshed in the HTML designer.
trans-unit.target: Impede que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controle de atualização quando o esquema de fonte de dados é atualizado no designer de HTML.

trans-unit.source: The OnSchemaRefreshed method notifies control designer object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control that is bound to the associated data source that the fields in the schema have changed.
trans-unit.target: O método OnSchemaRefreshed notifica o objeto de designer de controle para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controle associado à fonte de dados associados os campos no esquema foram alterados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, it prevents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control from updating itself.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é chamado, ele evita o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controle de atualização em si.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of records that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control displays on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de registros que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controle exibe na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The SampleRowCount property always returns 21.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SampleRowCount sempre retorna 21.

trans-unit.source: This causes 21 records to be displayed in the design surface for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que 21 registros a ser exibido na superfície de design para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: An exception is if there is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> template and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a value less than 21.
trans-unit.target: Uma exceção é se há um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>dentro de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>modelo e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é definida como um valor menor que 21.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the number of records to display is the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o número de registros a serem exibidos é o valor de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of records that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control will display on the designer surface is 21 records.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de registros que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controle será exibido no designer de superfície é 21 registros.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The number of records that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control displays on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O número de registros que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controle exibe na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the content for an editable region of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o conteúdo para uma área editável do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: An editable design region that is contained in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma região de design editável que está contida no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The content to assign for the editable design region.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo para atribuir para a região de design editável.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer should use a temporary copy instead of the actual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control that is associated with the designer in order to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer deve usar uma cópia temporária em vez de real <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controle que está associado com o designer para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.
